name: Laser Goons - Demo
description:
You are an astrounaut, lost on a dark planet, where the only source of light is the beaming of your lasers! To unsolve mystery of this place and escape you will have to be brave and will have to face off dangers no human has ever faced. 

Controls :

WSAD - move

Space - jump

LMB - equip shooting weapons / shoot

Rolling wheel on mouse - changing weapons -> pistol / machine gun / bubble gun / sniper rifle / missile launcher

RMB - zoom view

Q - use flashlight / if bought 

TAB - to read through found files and traverse through equipement

E - to interact with objects / materials / loot

Hold 'T' - to find nearest objective

Interacting with a shop ->

In Laser Goons, you lose gathered materials if you die, so to preserve them, you have to store them in the only light source / base. Just press 'E' on the circle stand to store your materials - they are saved forever now! Hold 'R' while in base to reload your energy ammunition. Use arrow keys to pick what you want to buy and press 'Enter' to buy equipment!
